name: Speed Sort Loading
description:
Made for #LoadingJam, in celebration for the expiration of Namco's patent on auxiliary games in loading screens.

This small entry has a bit of speed to it, your aim is to sort the letters at the top to ascending order at the bottom, using the number keys to select each letter. You have 30 seconds to correctly sort as many sets as you can, and you earn a point for each correctly placed letter.

Thanks for playing!
